alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 9:14PM CDT until June 18 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Central Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 914 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Montrose, or 10 miles west of Lake Village, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mcmillan Corner around 925 PM CDT. Lake Village around 930 PM CDT. Chicot Junction around 940 PM CDT. Avon and Wayside around 955 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
